title: Manual upload
fileUploadText: Manually upload a csv, doc, docx, htm, html, json, or pdf file, max size 2MB

pageHelp.heading: Lists
pageHelp.text: You must ensure that you only upload one file that contains all hearings for the Court or Tribunal name and List type. This should include all judges and court rooms in one document.

pageHelp.heading: Sensitivity
pageHelp.text: You need to indicate which user group your document should be available to:

pageHelp.heading: Private
pageHelp.text: Publication available to all verified users e.g. Legal professionals and media.

pageHelp.heading: Classified
pageHelp.text: Publication only available to verified users who are in a group eligible to view that list e.g. SJP press list available to Media

pageHelp.heading: Display from
pageHelp.text: This will be the date the publication is available from, if today's date is used it will be displayed immediately. If a date in the future is used, it will display from 00:01 of that date.

pageHelp.heading: Display to
pageHelp.text: This will be the last date the publication is available. It will be displayed until 23:59 of that date.

warningText: Prior to upload you must ensure the file is suitable for publication e.g. redaction of personal data has been done during the production of this file.

courtSearchErrors.notFound: Please enter and select a valid court
courtSearchErrors.minCharactersReq: Court name must be three characters or more

dateErrors.dateRange: Please make sure 'to' date is after 'from' date

fileUploadErrors.typeError: Please upload a valid file format
fileUploadErrors.sizeError: File too large, please upload file smaller than 2MB
